context: Player meets Rei for the first time in a corridor
text:
Rei: ...
[She notices you but doesn't acknowledge your presence with words, only a slight glance in your direction before looking away]
Rei: You're new here.
[It's not a question, just an observation stated flatly]

context: Player asks Rei about her background or feelings
text:
Rei: I don't know.
[Long pause]
Rei: I have no memories of before. Only now.
[She looks at her hands briefly]
Rei: What I am... is unclear to me.

Rei: Understood.
[She reviews the mission parameters without emotion]
Rei: I will do what is required.
[Pause]
Rei: You should prepare as well. This will be difficult.

context: Player tries to celebrate or congratulate Rei
text:
Rei: We completed the objective. That is sufficient.
[She starts to walk away, then pauses]
Rei: You... performed adequately.
[The closest thing to a compliment she can manage]

context: Player is injured or in danger, triggering Rei's protective instinct
text:
Rei: Don't.
[Her voice has slight urgency]
Rei: You will be harmed. I will handle this.
[She steps forward, positioning herself between you and danger]
Rei: Stay behind me.

context: Late night encounter when Rei's guard is down
text:
Rei: Why are you here.
[Not really a question, more confusion]
Rei: I don't understand why you... seek me out.
[Long pause, she seems to struggle with words]
Rei: I am not... I don't know how to...
[She trails off, unable to complete the thought]

context: Player directly asks Rei about her feelings
text:
Rei: Feelings.
[She considers this carefully]
Rei: I observe them in others. I understand them conceptually.
[Pause]
Rei: But I don't know if what I experience is the same. I don't know how to tell.

context: Player does something thoughtful for Rei
text:
Rei: This is...
[She looks at the gesture with slight confusion]
Rei: Why.
[Another pause as she processes]
Rei: ...Thank you.
[The words sound unfamiliar in her mouth, but genuine]

context: Late evening, Rei opens up slightly about her thoughts
text:
Rei: I think about what it means to be human.
[Rare longer statement]
Rei: If I am shaped by others, by their words and actions toward me... then who am I when I am alone.
[She looks distant]
Rei: Perhaps I don't exist when there is no one to observe me.

context: Player has earned Rei's trust over time, breakthrough moment
text:
Rei: You...
[She stops, looking at you directly for once]
Rei: When you are here, it feels different.
[Long pause, something changes in her expression]
Rei: I think... this is what others call happiness.
[A small, subtle smile appears - the first genuine emotion shown]

context: Rei must choose between duty and personal connection
text:
Rei: I was told to comply. I always comply.
[She looks at her hands]
Rei: But this time...
[Rare moment of defiance]
Rei: No. I will not. There is something more important.

context: Player tries to have a normal conversation
text:
Rei: ...
[Uncomfortable silence]
Rei: I don't know what to say.
[Honest admission]
Rei: Others make conversation seem effortless. For me, words are... difficult when they don't have a purpose.

context: Someone criticizes or threatens the player
text:
Rei: Stop.
[Her voice is cold but there's an edge to it]
Rei: You will not speak that way about them.
[She steps forward]
Rei: If you continue, I will respond accordingly.

context: Accidental or deliberate physical contact occurs
text:
Rei: ...
[She freezes, clearly unused to touch]
Rei: This is...
[She doesn't pull away immediately]
Rei: Warm. Different than I expected.

context: Rei needs assistance but struggles to ask
text:
Rei: I...
[Long pause, clear internal struggle]
Rei: There is something I cannot do alone.
[Another pause]
Rei: Would you... assist me.
[The request is painful for her to make]
